name: Connect Your Home
tag_list: home-services, moving-service, home-relocation-service, cable-tv-service, satellite-tv-service, home-security-system, home-communication-solutions
overview: Connect Your Home provides home services solutions for customer who are looking to switch to a new service or are looking to move and relocate to a new home. Connect Your Home is an authorized retailer for the following products and services: DISH Network, ADT, HughesNet, Verizon FiOS, Charter, Time Warner Cable, Tech Support for Dummies, wireless services and more.
